It is very easy to install and you can watch the entertainment provided in 10min or less.I would like to be able to pick from the genre on the movies and TV selections like action adventure or comedy rather that just movies and TV recent and new. I do like that Prime is clearly marked, As some of them are not offered without having to pay more money. Over all this is a good product and I would recommend it to my friends
